title: AI-Powered Gimbal?! Insta360 Flow Review!
description: Ive partnered with Insta360 to show you their new AI-powered mobile phone gimbal, Flow! Click the link here  to check it out!   PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE:    GET YOUR OURA RING:    FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:
transcript: - Hey, it's Justine, and today we are checking out a brand new gimbal for your phone. This is the Insta360 flow. You may be familiar with some Insta360 cameras that I've reviewed here in the past. They just recently came out with a webcam. They have some incredible 360 cameras but now they're getting into the Gimbal game and this has a ton of different features. Three access stabilization, deep track 3.0, foldable and portable, one step rapid deploy, auto mode, AI powered editing, magnetic design, built in selfie stick and tripod, all day battery life and a smart wheel. Let's see what all of those things mean. And get into the unboxing. It's right there. Whoa, check that, oh my goodness. What the heck? This looks so cool. It's like transparent so you can see inside of it. That's a really cool feature. What a little surprise. Very tiny like this is it, here it is. What great packaging design, just unfolds right before my eyes. And this is in like a little pouch. This is super cute. I've unboxed a lot of Insta360 things before and this might be my favorite. So it looks like we have the mount for your phone right here. We've got a USBC to USBA cable and this, this is actually so cute. This is a little light that you can attach to the top of it. So if you're in low light situations, you can attach this and have a light. I'm not gonna lie, I don't think I've ever seen a gimbal come with a little light or a little purse. Like look at this. We also have a little strap for the purse. I mean, I'm gonna call it a purse but you can call it a carrying case. Call it what you want. Who is she? Look at that. Super cute. They say it's like a one step deploy. Oh, it auto turns on in everything. Phone mount, this also has a grip that you can add to it, that actually helps out a lot. Now I have pretty small hands and my hand fits this perfectly. But the cool thing about this is it has a built-in tripod and an extender. So if you need more space, you can just pull this bottom out and it gives you a more comfortable grip. This also has a tripod built-in which I've not seen any gimbals with built-in tripods. I've seen phone gimbals that have attachments that you would also have to carry with you but this just folds right up inside of the device. Now I have used them like that but I'm not gonna lie to you. A lot of times I use these when I'm out at events or if I'm places where I don't wanna ask people to take a photo for me. I will set this up and use these types of things to take photos by myself. I don't need anyone's help, I'm just self-sufficient. My phone isn't currently connected to it but with this you'll be able to scroll and change the different modes.
